Issue.creator: ga25waq
Issue.summary: Wrong tag for couchdb's Docker image (?)
Issue.description: ./test/fixtures/dockerenv/.env (as well as in prerelease-env.sh) the variable > FABRIC_COUCHDB_FIXTURE_TAG is set to > 1.1.0 However, there is no such tag on the Docker hub. Instead, there are tags for the different architectures based on version 0.4.6. >
